name: Time Travel
the-point: If you could visit any era for 24 hours without changing history, where would you go?
context: Focuses on personal interests and history.

name: Superpower
the-point: Would you rather have the ability to fly or be invisible?
context: A classic 'this or that' to gauge personality.

name: Last Meal
the-point: What would your absolute final meal on Earth be?

name: Lottery
the-point: What is the first 'useless' thing you would buy if you won $10 million?

name: Movie Life
the-point: Which movie world would you actually want to live in?
context: Explores their taste in fiction and comfort.

name: Hidden Talent
the-point: What is a weird talent you have that almost nobody knows about?
context: Great for breaking the ice with humor.

name: Bucket List
the-point: What is the number one thing you want to do before you die?
context: Moves the conversation into deeper aspirations.

name: Space vs Sea
the-point: Would you rather explore the deep ocean or outer space?
context: Triggers a debate on fear vs. curiosity.

name: Pet Talk
the-point: If your pet could talk for 5 minutes, what do you think they would say about you?

name: Skill Swap
the-point: If you could wake up tomorrow with a master-level skill, what would it be?
context: Highlights what they value or admire.

name: Historical Dinner
the-point: Which three people, dead or alive, are coming to your dinner party?
context: A deep dive into their influences.

name: First Concert
the-point: What was the first concert you ever attended, and was it actually good?

name: Alien Contact
the-point: If aliens landed today, would you be the first to welcome them or the first to hide?
context: Funny way to talk about bravery.

name: Dream Job
the-point: If money didn't exist, what would you spend your days doing?

name: Desert Island
the-point: You’re stranded on an island. You can have one book, one movie, and one album. Go.

name: Childhood Hero
the-point: Who was your hero growing up, and do you still look up to them?

name: Tech Ban
the-point: Could you survive a week without your smartphone for $1,000?
context: Starts a debate on tech dependency.

name: Travel Destination
the-point: What’s the one place you’ve visited that you would never go back to?

name: Advice to Self
the-point: What advice would you give your 15-year-old self?

name: Spirit Animal
the-point: If you had to be an animal for a day, which one matches your energy?

name: Olympic Sport
the-point: Which Olympic sport do you think you could actually compete in with 1 year of training?

name: Best Gift
the-point: What is the most thoughtful gift you have ever received?

name: Parallel Universe
the-point: In a parallel universe, what do you think the 'other' you is doing right now?

name: Musical Life
the-point: If your life had a theme song, what would it be?

name: Weekend Vibe
the-point: Are you a 'packed schedule' traveler or a 'lay on the beach' traveler?
